long_description: The SmartWool Training beanie features lightweight, supersoft merino wool that offers enough insulation to keep your head warm when you're out for a run or a day of cross-country skiing. 4-panel, single-layer crown construction has a good fit. Contoured, double-layer merino wool earband adds warmth and comfort.
short_description: The SmartWool Training beanie features lightweight, supersoft merino wool that offers enough insulation to keep your head warm when you're out for a run or a day of cross-country skiing.
